overview: A small-time workout guru becomes obsessed with the idea that he needs to escape his body. He connects with a biohacker who begins injecting him with experimental CRISPR gene therapies, setting off a struggle to hold onto his friends and his own humanity.
tagline: When a small-time workout guru becomes obsessed with the idea that he needs to escape his body, he connects with a biohacker to receive injections with experimental CRISPR gene therapies.
title: Human Gauntlet
